concept.title: Wildcard Use for Arrays and Maps
concept.shortdesc: In some processor properties / When you list a set of fields in a processor, you can use the asterisk wildcard (*) to represent an index in an array or a key value in a map. Use a wildcard to help define the field path for fields in maps and arrays.

draft-comment.author: Loretta
draft-comment.p: ** array index or map key ** Team [*]/Employee[*]/* (for all info about all employees on all teams
